modName: Skyrim Spell Mod Taunting Target aka Angel's Roar
summary: Adds two spells that are inspired by the Silkroad skills of Berserker Mode and Warrior Taunting Target.
descriptionHtml:
Adds two new spells that include custom sounds
 1) Angel's Roar
 2) Holy Berserker Mode
- Angel's Roar causes frenzy effect (2x as powerful), stagger, and damages target's stamina and magicka.
- Holy Berserker Mode is a power that boost your damage by 2x and reduce damage by half. Duration is 1 minute; To be used once per day.
Both spells are inspired by SilkroadR skills. Angel's Roar is inspired by the Warrior's Taunting Target skill and Holy Berserker Mode is inspired by the Berserker Mode in Silkroad where your character turns into this pink demonic thing.
Spell tomes can be found in the Temple of Talos in Windhelm.
author: Bronyphony
